structured_data.description: Greater noida's most popular society aba cherry county in techzone 4 greater noida west offers 3 bhk apartment. Property has 964 sq.Ft. Super built-Up area with 2 bathrooms & 3 balconies attached. This flat is constructed on 1206 sq.Ft. Area. This flat lies on the 15th floor of a 20 storey building. Well maintained 1-5 years property. This is a semi-Furnished flat. Furnishing options provided - 5 light, 4 fan, 3 wardrobe, 1 water purifier, 1 modular kitchen, 1 chimney, 1 curtains and 1 exhaust fan. Ready to occupy from mon, 17 nov 2025, this property is ideal for family on any agreement type with a notice of 1 month for a duration of 11 months. The expected rent is 24,500 monthly and is negotiable. Electricity & water charges are excluded. Security deposit of 24500 is required. This flat has all latest feature like reserved parking, intercom facility, power back-Up, water storage, security / fire alarm and feng shui / vaastu compliant. Society provides modern lifestyle facilities like swimming pool, fitness centre / gym, club house / community center, park, shopping centre, grocery shop, lift(s), maintenance staff and visitor parking. There are more things to like about this property such as rain water harvesting, corner property, pet friendly, wheelchair friendly and in a gated society. Power backup: Full. The flat is facing towards north-East. The flat has vitrified flooring.
